discount.text: To set the tag text, simply enter [desconto] where you want the discount amount to appear. In the store, this tag will be replaced with the corresponding discount value.

quick_navigation.paragraph: Explore agile navigation with the option to display menu items on hover, enabling users to directly access the desired pages without the need to click first.

apply_p_and_b_filter.on_hover: Apply price and brand filter on hover

alignment.titles_and_texts: Select the alignment of titles and texts

title_subtitle_tabs.alignment: Select title, subtitle and tabs position

cards.desktop_quantity: Select the number of cards per line on the desktop
cards.mobile_quantity: Select the number of cards per line on mobile
cards.quantity_desktop: Select the number of cards per line on the desktop
cards.quantity_mobile: Select the number of cards per line on mobile

lines.quantity_desktop: Select the number of lines on the desktop
lines.quantity_mobile: Select the number of lines on mobile

item.label: Menu item
item.info: Specify the menu to apply the mega menu.

select_principal.label: Select principal product
select_principal.info: Only if you want to specify the recommendation, or use the component outside the product page.

products.select_quantity_products_desktop: Select quantity of products displayed on Desktop

predictive_search.name: Predictive Search
predictive_search.text_background_predictive_search: Background of predictive search text on hover
predictive_search.text_color_hover_predictive_search: Text color of predictive search on hover

placeholder.info: Define the default images that will appear in specific situations in your store, such as products without images or store errors.

favicon.label: Favicon
favicon.info: Will be reduced to 32 x 32 pixels

product_type.label: Type of structure of product variants

product.info: Define the desired product behavior for your store.

product_card.info: Define the styles for all product cards in your store.

installments.info: Define the rules for how installment payments work in your store.

cart.name: Cart
cart.view_cart_count_items: View cart count items on Icon

suggest_related_products.label: Suggest Related Products
suggest_related_products.info: Enable suggestion of related products in the cart! When the customer adds a product to the cart, they will see suggestions of related products that can be added to the cart.

product_collection_recommendations.label: Product Collection Recommendation
product_collection_recommendations.info: With an empty cart, the customer will see the collection you've chosen.

show_free_shipping.label: Display free shipping
show_free_shipping.info: Enable free shipping in the cart! Enter the minimum value for free shipping (e.g., 100, without the currency symbol) and adjust the shipping settings in your store to match.

view_product_recommendations.label: Display product recommendations
view_product_recommendations.info: Boost your sales by enabling product recommendations! Suggest related items in the cart to drive upsell in your store.

select_recommendation_action.label: Select recommendation action
select_recommendation_action.info: Clicking 'Add' will insert the product directly into the cart. Opting for 'View details' will take the user to the specific product page, a valuable choice especially for items with variants.

placeholder.info: Set the image that will appear when the cart is empty.

brand_and_information.info: Allow your customers to save your store as an app on their cell phones.

enable_application_mode.info: This allows your customers to save an app for your store on their mobile devices.
enable_application_mode.label: Enable Web App

identity.info: Define the identity of your Web App, how it will appear on customers' mobile screens.

application_maskable_icon.info: This icon must be transparent to support different icon formats. Minimum size 1024x1024px.
application_maskable_icon.label: Select adaptive icon

application_show_button.label: Enable Installation Button
application_show_button.info: This allows your customers to see a button in your store to install your app on their mobile devices.

card_image_margin.label: Select the margin of the image on the card.

show_collections_count.label: Show number of products in collections

empty_menu_text.label: Text when there is no selected menu

show_image_from_collection.label: Use the image from the collection

table.info: Write the day of the week and time separated by |. Example: Monday | 08:00 to 18:00
table.label: Table of days and times
table.write: Write day of the week and time

table.label: Table of days and times
table.write: Write day of the week and time

company_name.label: Write the company's name or legal business name

gap.label: Select the gap between the cards

grid_cols_desktop.label: Select the number of cards per line on the desktop

grid_cols_mobile.label: Select the number of cards per line on mobile

content_align.label: Select the alignment of texts and buttons

card_image_margin.label: Select the margin of the image on the card.

cashback.info: To set the cashback text, simply enter [value] where you want the cashback value to be displayed. In the store, this tag will be replaced by the corresponding cashback value.

mosaic_gallery.two_images_per_row_with_one_big: Two images per row with one big
